tweet.text: In the 1950s, U.S. personnel regularly traveled through the Khyber Pass to reach our Embassy in Kabul, #Afghanistan. Join @historyatstate to hear U.S. diplomats tell their own tales of the journey and to see their photos and footage: https://t.co/M2V7k1IirS
tweet.html: In the 1950s, U.S. personnel regularly traveled through the Khyber Pass to reach our Embassy in Kabul, #Afghanistan. Join @HistoryAtState to hear U.S. diplomats tell their own tales of the journey and to see their photos and footage: go.usa.gov/xPy4w
